title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the user interface.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be set at '18 points'.
OB: The label height does not change immediately after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: After modifying the font size of a label, the label's height should reflect the changes made.
SR:
1. Add a label to the user interface.
2. Modify the font size of the label to be '18 points' and observe if the label height adjusts accordingly.
